title: Riot please do more skin votes in the future!

embed.description: An inside look at the whats, whys, and hows of making League of Legends.

body:
I really love this vote on Illaoi. It allows us players to give more input on furture products while also giving us some hype! 

Riot please do more skin votes in the future! 

######honestly it would increase your profit since you'll be finding out which skin's people will actually buy

#GO TEAM DEEP SPACE

######I love Adventurer too, but goddamn space themes are so cool

replies.body:
I think it's kind of nice to see this.  It's kind of similar to how we voted on Diana gaining the Fire skin in 2015 that she received in 2016.  This time though, we are actually choosing from a few different themes rather than a team winning that makes the theme.  

I would like to see more of these, but I think it only fits for when a champion hasn't gotten something in a while (i.e Illaoi). So, if there are other champs that don't get something new for an extended period of time then I think they should look into giving us a vote on various ideas they've had and see what the community really wants.


# GO TEAM ADVENTURER!
Exactly. This was a clear case of "this champ needs a skin. Let's find her a skin." I won't expect them to come up with 'vote your next Ahri skin'.

Ahah! Not true my friend! We were literally staring at a bunch of directions for her and decided the timing was juuuuuust right to hold a vote, something we've all wanted to do for a very long time. This is a BIT of an experiment, and judging on how well this event is received, we'd love to do more skin votes in the future.

In fact, a counter point to your Ahri example is that - let's be real - Ahri's got skins for days and the thematics in them cover a lot of ground. It'd probably even more valuable to hold a vote on a super popular champ with lots of skins to see what else is interesting to players. So hang in there, keep that feedback coming, and let's make something dope!
Okay, then I vote pool party Ahri!
